title: Data-Driven Instructional Design Strategies for Online English Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Customized English education program for science professionals: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) and asynchronous online learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can design online surveys to measure the effectiveness of English learning.
Learners can analyze English education data using descriptive statistics (mean, standard deviation) and inferential statistics (t-tests).
Learners can propose blended (synchronous/asynchronous) online English education strategies based on analytical results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
